name: BikeRacer
description:
Charley the stick-man takes his bike on an endless run in his doodle world!

Help him avoid obstacles and strange creatures using WASD or the arrows keys to go as far as possible. Use the bell (Q) to make animals aware of you. The longer you go, the more difficult it gets...

Good luck and post your highscore! :-)

Credits

Made with Unity 2020.3.x. All graphics are vector based and have been created using Inkscape. The sound effects have been recorded with my phone and have then been manipulated with Audacity.

Music by Andrey Sitkov
Licensed via Retro Casual Music Pack (Humble Software Bundle: Big Music 2)

Font "Patrick Hand" by Patrick Wagesreiter
